sentences.en: There was something peculiar in the way he smiled.
sentences.cn: 他微笑的方式有些奇怪。

words.imagery: 一个十字架，象征宗教讲道。

sentences.en: Christ began preaching to large crowds.
sentences.cn: 基督开始向大群人讲道。
